metadata.title: CVE-2024-26664 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:hwmon: (coretemp) Fix out-of-bounds memory accessFix a bug that pdata->cpu_map[] is set before out-of-bounds check.The problem might be triggered on systems with more than 128 cores perpackage.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
